Events that occurred on 30 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1953 - Actor Colm Meaney is born.
1959 - Swedish-French director Charlotte Brändström is born.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Jane T. Sibley.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Nancy Smith.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Philip Brown.
2010 - Guillermo del Toro announces he has departed from directing The Hobbit (film series).
2014 - Tolkien in the New Century: Essays in Honor of Tom Shippey is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events on this day.
